author: wmtan
body:
This PR fixes the 7_5_X build errors in CondFormats/BTauObjects and RecoBTag/PerformanceDB.
This PR should be forward ported into CMSSW_7_5_ROOT5_X.
The compilation error in CommonTools/Utils will be fixed in a separate PR, because that fix should _not_ be ported into CMSSW_7_5_ROOT5_X.
title: Fixes for compilation errors in CondFormats and RecoBTag
